It’s probably the best dental care I’ve been to yet.. and probably the best in Delhi!

and the best docs

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My experience at Oraa Care Smile Dental clinic has been great. I specially came from Gurgaon to get the treatment done. Multiple treatments have been done in past few days. One was tooth extraction and second was treating my overall teeth as i was facing lot of issues due to less teeth enamel and lot of gaps across. Dr. Pankaj Rao helped me understand the overall treatment process and the overall treatment procedure was executed with outmost care. She is definitely an expert in this area and I am really happy with the results. I recommend this clinic to everyone who are looking for expert doctors in dental care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Zirconia Crowns,Dental Crowns,Dental Checkup (General),Dental Fillings,
review:
My partner and I travelled from overseas to get a root canal done as well as a crown and fillings for both of us.  We were both extremely impressed by Dr. Rao's practice, everything from the clinic itself to her extremely capable staff.  Dr Rao took her time explaining the procedures and was very thorough in her execution of our treatments. Her staff provided lunch midway through treatment which was extremely thoughtful.  

We were nervous at first, traveling to a foreign country to do a medical procedure but we are writing this review to put your nerves at ease.   ** **** ****** ** *** **** ****** ********** ***** **** ****  We would recommend this clinic to anyone who needs dental/endodontist work done

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My husband (Mr. Vaibhav Bist) had booked the appointment from my app. He has penned down his experience with Dr Pankaj Rao.

A few years back, searching for a good doctor in the locality was a difficult task. 
Thanks to Practo, it has now become a smooth affair. When I was searching for a dentist on the app , I came across Dr. Pankaj Rao from Oraa Care Smile Dental Clinic whose reviews were positive. Getting impressed by those favourable reviews,  I decided to give her a visit for my gum bleeding problem. Even though I was skeptical about a dental visit during corona virus pandemic,  I visited her clinic and found it  well-managed. The staff ensured  that appointments are done in a manner that there is no rush in the reception area, the full body sanitisation, pulse and temperature  check were some of the key safety measures which were taken in the clinic. The  shoe caps were also provided to make sure that cleanliness is maintained inside the main clinic area. These measures impressed me largely on my first visit. After my first check up, I was advised a deep root cleaning and a deep root canal for one of my tooth. Until today,  I have had some four to five sittings with Dr. Pankaj and every single time she made my visit less scary. Because of her sophisticated subtle temperament with an excellent clinical expertise, I can visit her again if any tooth problem further persists.

Unlike other doctors in the area, the cost of dental treatment is absolutely pocket-friendly. To conclude Oraa Care clinic will henceforth be my only choice for all my dental-related problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Composite tooth filling,
review: I came with dental pain.. Very helpful.. Good RCT treatment done by Dr. Pankaj ma’am. Nice clinic ambience and very helpful staff.. Highly recommended.. All star 😊

The doctor did not inform me before starting the procedure about the after effects of it. She immediately asked about the problem and started the procedure ***** *** ******** ******* ***** ** ** *** ***** ******* ************** *** *** **** ** * ***** ** **** **** ***** ****** I will definitely not recommend this doctor. I went there reading about the number is stories posted for her and her experience but she didn’t live up to the expectations. *** ****** ****** ******** ***** *** ********* and more gaps in my teeth due to which I’m not able to eat the food properly. *** ****** ********** ** *******
reply_text: Hello mam, there are few things which doctors cannot bring them back.  You were told about  pyorrhea problem , for which the treatment suggested was cleaning. We did cleaning after you agreed to get it done. If you had problem , you wanted after being informed about cleaning, you should have taken another appointment.   Neither anyone forced you to get treatment same day.  You were informed before treatment and post operative instructions were given. Doctors donot cause any gap , gaps occur if you collect many millimeters of deposits for a long period of time, these deposits lead to bone loss and gum recession.  Your gums are so swollen due to which you are not able to eat  properly.   Bone loss and gum recession has lead to your gaps. stop blaming doctors for your negligience

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Microscope Assisted Root Canal Treatment,Zirconia Crowns,Tooth Coloured Fillings,Oral Surgery Procedures,
review: I visited Oraa Care for tooth pain. But Dr. Pankaj Rao found out that I had cavities  other tooth as well. I had fillings done there. The major issue were in two tooth which went for RCT. To conduct RCT, one teeth also had to be extracted. Both extraction and RCT was painless experience. I also had then a join crown fitted on the tooth on which RCT was done. It was a smooth experience and everything was handled professionally. I did not encounter any issue at all during multiple visits for the clinic. It was overall a positive and satisfactory experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: I have recently come back from abroad. I felt pain in the lower teeth. My father suggested to visit Dr. Pankaj at Oraa care . When I visited the clinic I found it to be at par with the dental clinics abroad. The clinic is neat and clean with latest equipments. Dr. Pankaj is a thorough professional and highly skilled. Upon examination I was explained about my tooth problem . I was provided complete information about my problem, the course of treatment and the cost of treatment . My problem required RCT to be done on the 2 lower teeth and dental caps. The entire treatment process was completed with ease and professionally. I found Dr Pankaj to be highly skilled and she handles her patients respectfully and with patience. I highly recommend Oraa dental center and Dr Pankaj for all your dental treatments.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Recently I visited Oraa care dental clinic for the extraction of my wisdom tooth. I was very apprehensive about the entire procedure , but doctor Pankaj was very friendly and she explained the procedure very nicely. The entire procedure was done  in very professional and painless manner.  Again I visited her clinic for another dental issue. She was truthful enough to suggest only cavity filling rather than going for an expensive crown for the same. ****** ****** ** **** ******* *** ********* ** *** ***** Needless to say I was highly satisfied and I would highly recommend her to anyone facing dental issues. 😊

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

review:
I had a great experience at the Oraa Care Smile DenUnder RCT, fillings and dental cleaning. Dr. Pankaj Rao, Dr. Akansha Tokas and team was very professional *** ************** She has explained my dental problem in much detail. most impressive part of my visit was that Dr. Pankaj took the time to show me my problem areas on my x-rays. This helped me to know why and how to care for my teeth better, thus motivating me to do so. I never felt rushed. She and her staff have a special way of making your visit personalized, comfortable and stress-free.
Thank you for your great service...!!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Dr Pankaj Rao is one of the highly experienced doctor dealing with dental issues in Dwarka. She clearly explains the issue and treat patients accordingly. Last year, I got my mom in law treated by her when we used to live in Dwarka.

Recently, I again got my mother in law treated by Dr Rao. premolars and molars of my mom in law were in very bad condition due to pyorrhoea. Dr Rao treated my mom in law with great perfection, firstly Dr Rao got her RCT done which is actually painless and my mom did not take any pain killer after her RCT.After her RCT,  Dr Rao performed bridging of 4 teeth, that too again with perfection.

Dr Rao treats her patient's with so much patience, in my case my mom- in law was so comfortable and this gave us a strong reason to travel 40 kms from Vaishali Ghaziabad to Dwarka. Dr Rao is undoubtedly a one stop solution for any dental problem.

I wish Dr Rao in all her future endeavours!
Regards
Manisha Jha

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: I had pain in my molars , so I took an appointment with Dr Pankaj Rao , on visiting her clinic, she explained me the reasons of the ache and suggested the countermeasures , one of the wisdom teeth was to be removed and there were a few others which needed fillings . She did all of them so painlessly and with the utmost quality . I had the jaw locking issue which I informed her , she then took care of that as well while treating so that I do not face any difficulty during the treatments . ********* *** ** *** ** *** **** ******** **** * **** ******* **** *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: Well, to start with I really commend the doctor and her team team to be available in these tough times for treating patients. Facility was adept with sanitising methods which made me feel safe.*** ********* *** ******* *** ** *** ******** **** ***** ******** ******* the charges were mind boggling. charged me Ruppes 2500. When confronted with the rates are quite high she was very close to being impolite and gave a very unconvincing answer ***** ****** **** ** **** **** **** * ***** ** ** ******* *** ********* ****** ***** ********* ********* * ******** ********* ****
reply_text: The charges for consultation were told at the reception  and the treatment  charges were clearly told before starting treatment. At the time of corona pandemic where  there are lot of overhead charges involved during treatment  , how can we wave off consultation,  which was different from treatment.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,
review: The service provided was excellent. The doctor was exceptionally caring, meticulously guiding me through each step of the process across multiple sessions, prioritizing the eradication of the infection before proceeding with treatment. I underwent root canal for two front teeth and subsequently had crowns placed. The doctor played a crucial role in restoring my beautiful smile. Grateful to the entire team at Oraa Clinic and the doctor for their assistance.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
My total all over all experience  from oraa care is Great
Firstly I have visited for tooth filling for little bit decay in teeth then only doctor suggested me that my wisdom thooth has totally been decayed 
Then she suggested me for surgical extraction 

It almost take 4-8 weeks for overall healing so don't be panic...

Let me clear about before and after procedure you do t have to be penic doctor give anesthesia injection before process there fore we don't feel any sensation while the process and it almost take 40 - 45 mins for extraction .I haven't feel any discomfort or blood flowing too much and after a week we have to be in clinic for opening stitches it takes 4 - 5 mins and at last doctor suggested for Luke warm water split 2-3 times a day

So my overall experience here has been Great including staffs and doctor have such a warm gesture
and I haven't feel any type of discomfort in between the days....
And would suggest you to come to Oraa clinic once if you have any problem related to tooth.

Cheers 
Ashutosh

context: Microscope Assisted Root Canal Treatment,Zirconia Crowns,
review: **** ****** ** ******* Dr Pankaj Rao and team know their job well. I am extremely happy with my treatment journey. Highly recommended.
Doctor was very rude , can't believe dentist saying you have to hold yourself camera/sensor in your mouth for X-Ray and she will not put hands in patient mouth...
reply_text:
Hello sir, the doctor told you to hold the  x-ray sensor in your mouth. Do u know what will happen to us? we are exposed to x-rays multiple times throughout the day, when patients like you refuse to hold the xray sensor. You mean to say the patient will not hold an xray sensor for their tooth and the doctor should hold it for them? 
There is nothing to be rude about it, but we can't get exposed while shooting xray for our patients. Definitely we will not put our hands in the patient's mouth while x-ray is being taken.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I have visited several times to her Clinic related to Root canal treatment and my total Dental health issues.I am fully satisfied for the treatment provided to me  by Dr. Pankaj Rao.  I personally regreat why I am so late to find out a  Dr.  like her.  During the treatment I feel homely, comfortable , painless and fearless. This is an wonderful experience with Dr. Pankaj Rao. ** **** ******* **** ******* *** ** * ******** **** ** ***. It is relevant to her.May God bless her and give her an opportunity  to serve the countrymen for a long long period..... * ***** *** ** *** ** *** **** *** ***** **** **** *********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I went to her clinic with my 6 year old one who needed attention on multiple cavities. The entire treatment started off well but slowly I observed that the entire process of treatment and strictness towards kids had made my child very very uncomfortable. DR Pankaj, looked very professional which I appreciate however her behavior towards my kid was completely not acceptable. Secondly, after initial xray based diagnose, I was told that there is no need for RCT. Her diagnose got changed in the middle of treatment and it seemed that there is no way other than going for RCT. Looking at the high cost of treatment at her clinic with these changes in diagnosis, made the entire experience worse. Overall, I would say overpriced and won't recommend ***** *****
reply_text:
We had told for filling for lower tooth for which he had trouble and was filled. When we started  with upper teeth in middle , that teeth required rct which we told you, but you wanted to go for filling . No diagnosis was changed. He had mostly complex cavities , which required placement  of band and retainer, we cant omit such protocols,  hearing about band placement  made child little uncomfortable.

Now coming to cost, he had multiple  complex cavities  in most of his teeth and we did composite fillings for him. Whatever  fillings old dentist had done were all fractured and gic material, not composite, and not all decays by ealier were not filled.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: i was really confused where should i go for dental treatment because its really important to make sure your doctor will do the exact genuine treatment you want . Dr. pankaj solved my all doubts and had a very friendly nature and i didnt feel like i was with doctor. i shared my all views and Everything very openly .. she did my tooth extraction and the procedure was so smooth i didnt feel any pain anything and even after treatment the painkillers and tablets managed everything very smoothly no complications at all ... i must recommend her if you are looking for a trustable , genuine doctor .

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I had underdone RCT and capping in two teeth around 5 years back which again started paining acutely a few weeks back. It was further complicated by another doctor in Dwarka who tried to forcefully remove the cap and damaged the affected area. It was handled so badly that I just dropped the idea of going to that doctor for a second visit and googled for another dentist. 

Thanks for the online recommendations from various patients, I decided to try out Dr. Pankaj Rao. I was impressed upon meeting her on my first visit itself. She was very patient in listening to the whole problem and then explained to me the course of treatment that she planned to follow. After that she went about doing the job over 4 sittings and treated the whole problem completely. Moreover, it was an absolutely painless experience !! She was very professional and tenacious in her approach.. she has a Divine Hand !! God bless her for the wonderful work she is doing !!!

From the moment you entered our clinic till you left. Everything was taken care of right from listening to your chief complaint then doing a through clinical and radiographical examination.  Then diagnosis and we made a treatment plan for you. You requested  to prescribe medication.

review: Experience was really good. Doctor is very polite and explain all the process related to your problems in detail
Didnt like the way doctor was charging so much fees for consultation and x ray separately and then really exorbitant RCT pricing
reply_text: My consultation charges are visible online before booking. Xray is a diagnostic aid which is separate, charges for which were told to you  before doing. Rct is a very specialised  treatment,  which everyone  can't do . Don't compare specialist  charges with a BDS graduate. Our root canals are laser assisted.

tags: Value for money,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment, Tooth Extraction,
review: Root canal treatment  for two teeth of mother was agreed at 15000 but ended up teeth extraction at 10000.
reply_text:
First of all it was a rerct  case, your mother had got a very bad rct done at some clinic and then you came for rerct to us. The condition of teeth and success predicability had been informed to you as well your mother from the very first day. Because  of her dwelling previous problems the teeth pain didn't  subside in both teeth. 

If you are looking for predictable  results, plz visit  specialist  initially only, not after getting it treated for 4 months by some quack , spoiling it and then expect specialist to do miracles. We gave multiple attempts to save but due to previous bone problems  pain didnot subside and we advised extraction. 

Two teeth rerct and then surgical  extraction by oral and maxillofacial surgeon is justifiable.
